HELP_ITEMS2.pt-BR:
**üß≠ Consiga items usando `/pescar`, `/ca√ßar`, `/explorar`, `/minerar`**
-Veja todos os items que voc√™ ou outra pessoa tem com `/invent√°rio ver`
-Items podem ser vendidos com `/invent√°rio vender`
-Veja todas as informa√ß√µes sobre um item como valores, raridade e usos com `/iteminfo`

‚öíÔ∏è **Items podem ser constru√≠dos com `/invent√°rio construir`**
-Calcule a quantidade de materiais necess√°rios para construir com `/invent√°rio calcular`
-Alguns items podem ser equipados para garantir benef√≠cios com `/invent√°rio equipar`
-Outros items podem ser usados e tem efeitos especiais com `/invent√°rio usar`

üë• Voc·∫Ω pode trocar items com outros jogadores usando `/troca`
**Para mais informa√ß√µes confira as p√°ginas de üè™ Mercado e üèûÔ∏è Fazenda**
HELP_ITEMS2.en-US:
**üß≠ Get items using `/fish`, `/hunt`, `/explore`, `/mine`**
-See all the items you or someone else has with `/inventory view`
-Items can be sold with `/inventory sell`
-See all the information about an item such as values, rarity and uses with `/iteminfo`

‚öíÔ∏è **Items can be crafted with `/inventory craft`**
-Calculate the amount of materials needed to craft with `/inventory calculate`
-Some items can be equipped to grant benefits with `/inventory equip`
-Other items can be used and have special effects with `/inventory use`

üë• You can trade items with other players using `/trade`
-For more information check the üè™ **Market** and üèûÔ∏è **Farm** pages
HELP_ITEMS2.es-ES:
**üß≠ Obt√©n items usando `/pescar`, `/cazar`, `/explorar`, `/minerar`**
-Ver todos los items que t√∫ o alguien m√°s tiene con `/inventario ver`
-Los items se pueden vender con `/inventario vender`
-Ver toda la informaci√≥n sobre un item como valores, rareza y usos con `/iteminfo`

‚öíÔ∏è **Los items se pueden construir con `/inventario construir`**
-Calcule la cantidad de materiales necesarios para construir con `/inventario calcular`
-Algunos items se pueden equipar para otorgar beneficios con `/inventario equipar`
-Otros items se pueden usar y tienen efectos especiales con `/inventario usar`

üë• Puedes intercambiar items con otros jugadores usando `/intercambio`
**Para m√°s informaci√≥n, consulta las p√°ginas de üè™ Mercado y üèûÔ∏è Granja**

HELP_INTRODUCTION2.en-US:
:sparkles: Your goal is to climb the ranks of the game to become number one
:partying_face: Or just have fun with your friends
:coin: See your gCoins and other information at any time using `/balance`
:stopwatch: The `/cooldowns` displays events and commands that have a cooldown
:school_satchel: You have an inventory in this game, earn items using `/fish`, `/hunt`, `mine` and `/explore`! See the items page for more info
:bank: Deposit regularly in your bank to collect interest in your money
:arrow_double_up: Rank up whenever possible to earn awesome perks! See the ranks page for more details
:question: See the other pages of this command to learn how to use a specific feature of gCoin
:100: We've covered the basics, but gCoin offers much more
:fire: Keep playing and experimenting, but more importantly, have fun!

HELP_MARKET2.pt-BR:
**O mercado √© um lugar onde usu√°rios podem comprar e vender itens entre si.**

**The market is a place where users can buy and sell items to each other.**
üì¶ Use `/market all` to see all the items available on the market.
üîç See all the listings of a specific item with `/market view`

**Have extra items or want a specific one?**
üõçÔ∏è List that you want to buy an item with `/market list buy`
üè∑Ô∏è List that you want to sell an item with `/market list sell`
üìÉ See all your listings with `/market listings`
‚ùå Remove a listing with `/market delist`

**El mercado es un lugar donde los usuarios pueden comprar y vender art√≠culos entre s√≠.**
